# subjectType

**Instance Property**

The static type of the subject being reflected.

## Declaration

```swift
let subjectType: any Any.Type
```

## Discussion

This type may differ from the subject’s dynamic type when this mirror is the `superclassMirror` of another mirror.
title: subjectType
